attributes.action: remove the charitable status of the anti car group "Brake"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We often heara lot of anti car rhetoric from "road safety charity" Brake when items about speed cameras and other motoring issues are in the headlines, Brake is an  anti car organisation  not a safety charity, it therefore does not merit its charitable status and does not deserve to be a registered charity with tax breaks

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "remove the charitable status of the anti car group "Brake"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18680


Prime Minister's Office
